title: WCD Uttar Kannada Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 211 Anganwadi Worker and Helper Posts
description: The Women and Child Development (WCD) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 211 Anganwadi Worker and Helper Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th can grab this chance and apply for the WCD Uttar Kannada Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online before the last...
